18#include "tools.h"
19
20static int vgexport_single(struct cmd_context *cmd __attribute((unused)),
21 const char *vg_name,
22 struct volume_group *vg,
23 void *handle __attribute((unused)))
24{
25 struct pv_list *pvl;
26 struct physical_volume *pv;
27
28 if (lvs_in_vg_activated(vg)) {
29 log_error("Volume group \"%s\" has active logical volumes",
30 vg_name);
31 goto bad;
32 }
33
34 if (!archive(vg))
35 goto_bad;
36
37 vg->status |= EXPORTED_VG;
38
39 dm_list_iterate_items(pvl, &vg->pvs) {
40 pv = pvl->pv;
41 pv->status |= EXPORTED_VG;
42 }
43
44 if (!vg_write(vg) || !vg_commit(vg))
45 goto_bad;
46
47 backup(vg);
48
49 log_print("Volume group \"%s\" successfully exported", vg->name);
50
51 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
52
53bad:
54 return ECMD_FAILED;
55}
56
57int vgexport(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
58{
59 if (!argc && !arg_count(cmd, all_ARG)) {
60 log_error("Please supply volume groups or use -a for all.");
61 return ECMD_FAILED;
62 }
63
64 if (argc && arg_count(cmd, all_ARG)) {
65 log_error("No arguments permitted when using -a for all.");
66 return ECMD_FAILED;
67 }
68
69 return process_each_vg(cmd, argc, argv, READ_FOR_UPDATE, NULL,
70 &vgexport_single);
71}
